newsitem.title: ESTONIA: WATER AND SEWAGE COST RISE PUSHES CPI HIGHER.
newsitem.headline: WATER AND SEWAGE COST RISE PUSHES CPI HIGHER.

text.p: Estonian consumer prices rose 1.9 over April with the biggest rise in water and sewage services, the statistics office said on Thursday.
"The biggest influence on the rise in April compared to March was water and sewage prices," the statistics office said in statement.
Regulated administrative goods and services increased by 11.4 percent and unregulated prices increased by 7.9 percent, the office added.
Over the past year, entertainment costs rose by 24.9 percent with a five percent rise for April.
Food price rises slowed in April to 1.0 percent compared to March's 2.7 percent rise.
